thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Chongqing Fuling Zhacai To Buy Two Seasonings Companies Via Cash, Share Issue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chongqing Fuling Zhacai To Buy Two Seasonings Companies Via Cash, Share Issue

organizations.name: chongqing fuling zhacai group co ltd

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Chongqing Fuling Zhacai Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY TWO SEASONINGS COMPANIES FOR ABOUT 236.5 MILLION YUAN ($37.26 million) VIA CASH, SHARE ISSUE
* SAYS IT PLANS TO RAISE UP TO 135.0 MILLION YUAN IN SHARE PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO FUND ACQUISITION, PROJECT Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CQZtaW ($1 = 6.3465 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
